name: Can I Pet Your Dog? Podcast
bio: Hey Guys! We're a podcast on Max Fun, with a groundbreaking take on dogs. We cover it all! Dogs We Met This Week, Stupid Dog Tech, Dog News, Dog Heroes... you name it, we're covering it. We also interview guests! We keep the conversation strictly to dog stories, if they want to discuss their latest projects, there's the door.
copy: Maximum Fun Network's Comedy Podcast about dogs. You like dogs? You podcasts? Well then you're gonna lose your mind over this show, it's got BOTH OF THOSE THINGS!
